title: Verify: Implement Memory Node with Persistent Vector Store
description:
Run automated tests for task T-055.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement upgraded Memory Node using ChromaDB or SQLite FTS for persistent storage. Migrate from in-memory dict to persistent backend.
Criteria:
- Memory Node uses persistent vector store
- Supports ChromaDB and SQLite FTS backends
- All memory operations are persisted
acceptance_criteria: Memory Node uses persistent vector store
Supports ChromaDB and SQLite FTS backends
